website_summaries.verdict: No skills? No problem. This angled tip makes winged eyeliner easy for everyone.
pros: Angled tip makes winged eyeliner easy, even for beginners
Includes smudging brush for the smokey eye look
Available in onyx, graphite, evergreen, and fig
Glides on smoothly and stays in place even on oily skin
cons: Product doesn't last quite as long as the other liners

customer_reviews.title: Come on Revlon, you’re better than this
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It’s perfect. The color selection and the angle is just right. Please do not stop making this product! Yes, this is all true however, Revlon, you must make a product that doesn’t fall down the drain when you open it. I am a loyal customer of this product. I love it! I’ve just gotten good at catching it before it goes down the drain because it’s not secure into the applicator. I should definitely be asking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Clairebear

customer_reviews.title: Loved it EXCEPT that the lead breaks off easily wasting ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it EXCEPT that the lead breaks off easily wasting product. Otherwise liked it but doesn't last long due to breakage of liner itself.ti That's the only reason I wouldn't reorder
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely pleased with this. I am a makeup junkie who buys all sorts of stuff even if I dont need it. This was another of those purchases, but unlike the others which I play with a couple times and then forget about, this has become my go to liner for when I need to have a perfect looking eye in a few seconds. It goes on smooth and even, and the angled tip makes the perfect line, not too thick or thin. Graphite is the perfect dark grey that will complement any eye color, I imagine (mine are dark brown) and eye shadow. And the price? Cant beat it!
customer_reviews.author: A Person

customer_reviews.title: I love the ease of application and the look of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of application and the look of the eyeline....however the actual pencil is not secure in the applicator and easily comes out. I initially thought the problem was isolated to the first eyeliner I purchased, however, this also happened with my second purchase. I really, really love the product but it's a pain to frequently have to keep inserting the pencil back in applicator.
customer_reviews.author: Ana R.

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner, all the shades are flattering.
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday when I apply eye makeup it is the trifecta. The kajal eyeliner is in a triangle. So it's goes from a skinny liner to a thicker liner. The thicker line really pops on under glasses. The brush at the end works great for eyebrows. I have every color. May hit pan on this I use it all the time. Would definitely repurchase. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: thatbooklynn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I usually use Revlon regular colorstay eyeliner, but this new one was terrible. It did not stay on and smeared very easily. It also transferred to under your eye
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay on waterline
customer_reviews.text: This is waterline safe, so YAY, but it doesn't stay there for more than 30 minutes! The next time I check a mirror, it's all sitting smudged right under my lower lashes, when I didn't put it there. Since I only wanted a waterline liner, I pitched it. Pros: true to color, non-irritating, relatively easy to apply Cons: migrates faster and more than any other eye makeup I have ever used in my life.
customer_reviews.author: IrishFire

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good price
customer_reviews.text: As eyeliners go, this stays on pretty well, but as a contact lens wearer, I need it to not budge. The colors are very nice and I'll use it on my upper eyelid on top. I can't use it for tight line or waterline, as some of the liner comes off.
customer_reviews.author: CG Sassy 1

customer_reviews.title: It smudges
customer_reviews.text: It is supposed to be waterproof but it smudges. I put it on at 8 AM and by noon I no longer had on eyeliner. It smudged all over the bottom of my eyes making me have dark under eyes. What did I do wrong?
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Love Love This Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I can't find it in the stores and will buy it again on Amazon. I love this color but want other colors too!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Zahn

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 2 yrs now (same color). I love it. It stays on all day. I use it for upper and lower lid in the "Fig" color which is a dark brn (I am blonde) It is a soft pencil which glides on easily. Only warning is to not roll the tip up too far as it will break off. I usually buy two pack and it lasts quite a while even tho I do apply makup daily. You need to try this color....won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Victor3325

customer_reviews.title: Buy at your own risk!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this product. Glides on easily and the brush side blends evenly. Dries to perfection. There’s just one major problem. You can’t extend the crayon more than a tiny tiny bit or it breaks off. Maybe it’s dried out because it’s past the expiration date? All I know is I’ve wasted money on this a few times but no more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stayed on all day and never smudged!
customer_reviews.text: Went on easy and stayed on all day. My only concern was the package (box) arrived with the end open and this liner is not sealed so you have no idea if anyone has used it already or how much is in the tube. Might only get a couple of uses out of it...who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Where to start? The pencil broke and fell on the floor! The angle side was dried out and it was impossible to use. Not your typical Revlon product. The brush is nicely shaped. I should have read all the reviews. I should have returned this but didn't have the time.
customer_reviews.author: G. R. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Does the work
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife and she loved it. It was damn cheap compared to what she used to buy from supermarkets.
customer_reviews.author: Atul Singh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect liner; needs a bit of TLC
customer_reviews.text: Love the angle so I can line just inside the lid. Be careful though as the product comes loose from the casing. I have in every color and only the green stays in place. Never mind though; I love the look so am just extra careful not to wind too far out.
customer_reviews.author: "moviesareheaven"

customer_reviews.title: Thick or thin eyeliner lines
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this in Texas but cannot find it anymore in green. I purchased 4 to keep me going for awhile. I really like this eyeliner. It goes on smooth and lasts. I like the green since it is a soft color and it makes my eyes look brighter. Plus, the cost is super low. I've paid around $9 per tube at the drug store.
customer_reviews.author: Fran B.

customer_reviews.title: The best, definitely try!
customer_reviews.text: Love how this goes on so easily, thick enough, but not too thick. the straight edge makes it a nicer line than a pencil or eyeliner crayon, perfect in between width. I don’t use it to make a wing, just basic eyeliner style. Once I started using this eyeliner I never looked for another one. I don’t wear much makeup, but I wear eye liner daily. So happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: ok.tar

customer_reviews.title: Super nice look 4 the eyes. Only lasts me 1month
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, just hate that there isn't a lot in the tube. I ussually need to buy a new one every month! Normal eyeliner pencils and other similar products would last 3Xs that!
customer_reviews.author: ERIKA

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in February and literally just wore it yesterday for first time and within minutes had terrible allergic reaction terribly. I was not where I could remove the product and today my eyes are in terrible shape! I have NEVER reacted like this to ANY eye product. This will not be used any longer nor will I purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: R E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have not quit using this eye pencil since I got it. Glides on easily and stays put. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Missbbbarnes

customer_reviews.title: Smooth application and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to use and smudge for just the right level of “I should do something with my face but don’t feel bothered to do much”. Glides beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Goes on thick and easy but it isn’t waterproof and I end up rubbing it off throughout the day. I do the thin liner style so it is running under my eyes by 10:30am
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable which is important
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on so easy goes exactly where you wanted to go and the smoothing brush is so soft you would think that it was a little bit to rock by the way it looked but it’s not it’s lovely definitely lovely I will purchase again And I did get three at one time and I’m happy that I did
customer_reviews.author: Annette M.

customer_reviews.title: Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I love this 👁 liner the darker colors are great for the brow also
customer_reviews.author: Rubies

customer_reviews.title: A favorite.
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite eyeliners. Goes on smoothly and easily. The angled tip makes it easy to apply. The fig color is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: BookcaseLaura

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure how do use the brush end, but I really love this eyeliner. Easy to use, wears all day, easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: SarahGrace

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and time. This dried out and broke all the way through. Was not able to return
customer_reviews.author: SixtoRod

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I found this. It works well as I use it for both eyeliner and eyelashes... Comparable price as in store but more convenient to have sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: its ok, not what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The color still smears under my eyes.....looking for something that doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cook

customer_reviews.title: Dry and crumbly
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner seems dried out. Little pieces keep breaking off. I've used this liner for a long time. These are probably old, since I can't find these in brick and mortar stores anymore. Not looking forward to the search for a different eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Jeena

customer_reviews.title: Really good eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: The reason I can’t give this 5 stars is because it breaks very easily. Maybe I’m heavy handed but it’s frustrating how many times it breaks during use.
customer_reviews.author: BabyBrian17

customer_reviews.title: Must try eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: I had never used this eyeliner before I have now used it twice this week And I love it! It stays on and is also very easy to put on too!
customer_reviews.author: Britnea

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it’s smudges a bit more than I expected that it would
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Love this eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner! Lasts all day! I love Revlon color stay products!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Color definitely doesn’t STAY as the name indicates.
customer_reviews.text: The retractable pencil is super soft and goes on easily. But it doesn’t stay on. Definitely not anywhere near waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: CARMEN JAMES

customer_reviews.title: Dried out.....
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this product. When I opened it , it was dried out. I have bought the same product in a different color before and it was great. This one sucked, had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this poduct
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong with revlon kajal at this price. The item is designed nicely and is egornmous.
customer_reviews.author: Bunty Parekh

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Really made this an easy eyeliner to apply with the new angled end! No breaking off of the product either as with other round end.
customer_reviews.author: GLORIA F DOWNS

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof in any way, color is very light
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof/color stay in any way, color is very light. Grey was more like a smoky color, which was odd. Brush is very firm, almost painful to use. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: CalmOverChaos

customer_reviews.title: If you use Kajal, this is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Better than other kajals, don’t smudge and very dark black and the angled applicator is very easy to get precision. Great find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My ALL time favorite eyeliner! This was my 4th one and I dont plan to buy any other kind. It stays put and looks great all day.
customer_reviews.author: Neleigh

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to Apply
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this eyeliner! The only makeup I wear is eyeliner and concealer and this is super easy to apply. I keep a tube in every one of my purses so I always have it for touch ups.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M.

customer_reviews.title: After getting use to it (still bad at winged looks though)
customer_reviews.text: After getting use to it (still bad at winged looks though),I really like this product. The Bush attached comes in hand when I mess up and it's pretty long lasting when primed. Without primer it basically rubs right off.
customer_reviews.author: Brie C.

customer_reviews.title: The color accentuates any eye color.  It’s very subtle
customer_reviews.text: Great eye contour product. Love the product and the Amazon price!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rychlicki

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smudge
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyeliner! I have used this for the past couple years. Then I couldn't find it locally. Ut glides on smoothly and stays put! Happy to have found it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't smear at all
customer_reviews.text: Out of the numerous eye liners I have, this is the best. It goes on smooth and stays on. I love that it's in an angle.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Pedroza

customer_reviews.title: Very good liner!
customer_reviews.text: Not the slim tip I expected ,but still a good liner!!its doesn’t smudge!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa vargas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My skin is very sensitive, and I am able to wear this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love color stay!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Stays on all day and doesn’t melt in the heat. Easy to apply. Wish I could find it in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. I love the color and it stay in place all day. It is easy to remove when you wash your face.
customer_reviews.author: Selee Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to put on because of the shape of the eyeliner, and once on it did not stay on! Also, it kept breaking off, and did not last long!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra L.

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Inconsistent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three (graphite). First one I opened and tried to use was dried out. The other two seem fine.
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: Eye shadow
customer_reviews.text: Took me a min to figure it out but is good for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Product was dried out, possibly expired? I had to throw both away because they were so hard. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: andrea hopf

customer_reviews.title: Breaking
customer_reviews.text: Though that is smug free but easily breaking every time, I will not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: A little too soft. But very easy to put on. And lasts longer than I expecte
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: New to Online Shopping
customer_reviews.text: Was unable to find in store, searched online, found & purchased a few. 😆
customer_reviews.author: Janet Hart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the rectangular applicator and enjoyed the staying power.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product - not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product - not waterproof, smeared under my eyes after wearing only a few minutes, had allergic reaction with my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: BFRITZ50

customer_reviews.title: SUPER pretty color (Graphite), very smooth easy application. Neat applicator!
customer_reviews.text: What a great, lovely color! It's soft and pretty, like if black and dove-grey had a baby. The application is SUPER smooth, and there's so much pigment, that I can still see it on my eyes two days later! After washing my face several times a day! The Only down side is that it Does smear if (like me) you use an oil-based foundation or BB cream. You'll have raccoon eyes for sure, until you wipe off enough that there's just the finest line between your eyelashes. Then that will stay for days.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Angled pencils are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for an angled pencil since another company stopped selling a similar product. My only complaint is that the tip does break if you have it out too far. I didn't think i had it susceptible to breakage but I'm going to watch it carefully. It also comes in 4 colors that I'm aware of. I have several as the angled option is difficult to find in any other line.
customer_reviews.author: chronicshopaholic

customer_reviews.title: OMG WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using eyeliner for decades! This is the easiest and longest lasting eyeliner EVER! The shape makes so much sense, the flow is great, not needing to be "sharpened" or changing shape is wonderful! Covers down to the lash line, Lasts all day, and yet is easy to remove! The price is perfect too. I'm excited to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: PatiIowa

customer_reviews.title: Runs, wide tip
customer_reviews.text: It's rather hard to apply because the tip isn't fine, it creates a wide thick line if you aren't very careful. After just a couple hours, even in cold temps, it runs onto my face. Not hard to remove though. It didn't make my eyes feel itchy like some eyeliner, no glittery aluminium in it. The brush on the opposite end is pretty rough and I wouldn't use it on my eyelids.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn84olives

customer_reviews.title: Great product but breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the product and think the price is great compared to what I was paying for other brands. I can only wear this in the winter, my eyes run a lot in the summer. I ordered 3 of these. 2 of the 3 would break all the time. Only one of them I was able to fully use since it didn’t break.
customer_reviews.author: Shus92

customer_reviews.title: Love this eyeliner wear graphite and onyx
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this eye liner for a couple of years. I love it, it does not flake or smear. Easy to apply and does not bother my eyes. I will say it is not easy to find in the store, I will be ordering from this amazon supplier from now on! I wore it all week in Florida and had no problems getting in and out of the water. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy the eyeliner was to apply, and the graphite color I chose was good. However, the pen kept breaking off even though I was very careful with it, so it only lasted about 4 months. I normally buy Urban Decay eye pencils and they last much longer but are much more expensive. I think this is a case of "you get what you pay for".
customer_reviews.author: Holly T

customer_reviews.title: Not really waterproof- smudge and make your eyes look dirty
customer_reviews.text: These eyeliners though advertised as waterproof don’t even stay long enough to be washed. They smudge and make a mess around your eyes. Easily erased by your fingers and leave dirty marks around your eyes and on your face. Would never buy them again. I purchased two (black and ever green). I wish I was in return window to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Revlon ColorStay  Angled Kajal Waterproof Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Goes on great! Best eyeliner I bought so far and I have tried many in my lifetime! Glides on very easy, no fuss, this color is like a dark emerald/navy (at least that's how I see it) GREAT COLOR I bought it as a "add on" item for just under $4 it sells for at least $10 at a regular store
customer_reviews.author: MarcyJS

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this eyeliner!! It actually stays on and in place through my entire 12 hour shifts!! It is so creamy soft, it is perfect for the waterline. It is the only liner I will use now.
customer_reviews.author: Loving Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good long-lasting liner
customer_reviews.text: I like that it doesn't smear after drying and lasts all day long. It's just great.
customer_reviews.author: Artbird

customer_reviews.title: Great application until the end breaks off.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeliner as it is so easy to apply and lasts until you wash it off. Unfortunately the end breaks off after several uses and wastes a good chunk of eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work on my eyes. I have dry skin so I use moisturizer around my eyes. That may be the issue, but it also did not work for my waterline.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia O. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: A very good eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I love the angle on this and the finishing brush is just perfect on the other end, smooths the way I want.
customer_reviews.author: Katwilm

customer_reviews.title: Always complimented
customer_reviews.text: Love that easy smoky eye look it can give me. I always receive compliments when I’m wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Katebeme

customer_reviews.title: Love this eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner! It goes on smooth and is easy to apply. The angled tip makes it easy to get the corners of your eye.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This pencil is for people seeking very bright and defined makeup makeup or for brunettes.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: I like that the product is nice and soft so it's easy to apply. I would actually prefer if the applicator were round instead of angled and flat.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gold

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I use this for both eyeliner and brown filler. Super soft and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time but this latest purchase was solid and unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Lieberman

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to a lot of brands but Revlon has always been gentle. I wouldn't call this waterproof, but more long-lasting. Nice angled tip and blender brush.
customer_reviews.author: aau

customer_reviews.title: Product too dry
customer_reviews.text: I generally love this eyeliner (I have used it for quite some time), but the specific product that showed up in my mailbox was not of good quality. It was almost too hard and dry to use. I should have requested a refund but never got to it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Haley

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, easy, fabulous product!
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner I’ve EVER used. I got several to last me quite a while. Hopefully they will still be making them when I finally run out.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Love this, will definitely buy more as long as they continue to make this liner!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect and so easy to use. Looks amazing...will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: bibi

customer_reviews.title: Not to buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to use. Not what I expected. Didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Coronado

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with it and glad to be able to order ...
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this product. I am very happy with it and glad to be able to order it on line
customer_reviews.author: Dar

customer_reviews.title: I love this eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest eyeliner to apply and it stays on all day. I'll be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: it might be water proof but still melts
customer_reviews.text: To me waterproof means it stays where you put it... this melts down into your face from just body heat. I wouldn't buy it again...disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Paula Sachs

customer_reviews.title: Nice straight lines.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like messing with my makeup too long. This goes on fast and looks good. Nice straight lines.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last on long and runs. Otherwise very dark black and goes on smoothly.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t stay on too long. I was a bit disappointed. It’s black enough, dark, intense black, I love that but it’s water proof and winds up under my eyes. A disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Laylah Bruckner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: everything is very good but it smudges easily, hence the 4 star
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: It's a No from me
customer_reviews.text: The application is a little patchy. You do have to build this up. Product pretty much disappears by lunchtime
customer_reviews.author: Allison F.Parkson

customer_reviews.title: Stays on all day.
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner! It's easy to apply and stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glides on easily. Styled to be used at different angles.
customer_reviews.text: It was easily applied. Of course you have to be careful. Can use the tip at what ever angle you wish for desired thickness or thinness.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Liquid liner is better for me.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it has two sides, but it was just OK. I found that I prefer liquid liner.
customer_reviews.author: Diva Queen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: smears...unless you are in for the look this is not really ideal for daily wear
customer_reviews.author: dipoledipole

customer_reviews.title: Easy application
customer_reviews.text: Like how it goes on, and the brush side helps it blend in
customer_reviews.author: Pauli S

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner. Working on my 2nd one. Use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: HC1

customer_reviews.title: Buyers regret!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't allow you to make a sharp clean line.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

product_meta.title: Revlon ColorStay 2-in-1 Angled Kajal Waterproof Eyeliner, Fig
product_meta.description: Color:FigThe Revlon ColorStay 2-in-1 Angled Kajal Waterproof Eyeliner features an angled tip for easy, precise application and pro-liner brush for bold, smoky eyes. The unique angled design allows for easy application that glides on smooth with rich, radiant color. Use this eyeliner to brighten and enhance your eyes, for a stunning, modern look. The Revlon Kajal eyeliner is Ophthalmologist tested and safe for use on the waterline. * Claim based on Nielsen Scantrack Service for long wear brands for YTD WE 12/31/2016, Total US and xAOC. Copyright 2016, The Nielsen Company.
feature_bullets: Angled tip to create defined lines
Includes smudge brush to create smoky eyes
Waterproof and safe for use on waterline, Ophthalmologist tested
